word:
I shall think of you and pray for you as we do, and may the Lord work in power for you. Do pray much and tell others I beseech of them to pray much. I will now say, God bless you, my son, with the best of Heaven's blessing. Try to get Edson heart and 


                                     -47- 

soul in the meetings. Help him all you can.--Letter 36, 1885. 





Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D.C. January 20, 1989. Entire Letter.
